title: Spicy Summer Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['4.5L (8 pints) water', '1 (500g) packet fusilli pasta', '275ml (10 fl oz) tomato juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons chilli powder', '3/4 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '50g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '75g (3 oz) frozen sweetcorn, cooked', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 bunch spring onions, chopped', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillet, poached and diced']
